meanings.sent1: The balloon started outbulging when it was filled with air.
meanings.sent2: The backpack was outbulging with all the books she had inside.
meanings.sent3: The cake batter began outbulging over the sides of the pan as it baked.
meanings.sent4: The excitement in the room seemed to outbulge as the surprise was revealed.
meanings.sent5: The joy in her heart outbulged as she saw her long-lost friend.

meanings.sent1: The outbulging tree roots made it difficult to walk along the path.
meanings.sent2: The outbulging cheeks of the chipmunk were adorable.
meanings.sent3: The outbulging clouds in the sky looked like fluffy pillows.
meanings.sent4: The outbulging eyes of the owl gave it a wise appearance.
meanings.sent5: The outbulging muscles of the athlete showed his strength.
